HEy yA'll !! k .. tis is my second time in posting, i'm trying my bez to understand tis bloggie ting and the way to make it more better in sum wae arh .. k since i've thought it over n over again, i decided to be gd back to my baby boi, FAZLY !! ugh, duno wat to blog bout .. // i went to far east plaza on friday and go shopping there.. fun lorh // today i nvr go sch cuz i got sore eyes.. whoa liao !! my eyes very itchy and pain !!! itz as small as samuel's(my clazmates hu hv the smallest eyes) eyes, & itz buldging out like goldfish eyes!! & it gotz a lot of eye shit !!!! I juz broke up wif fazly a few minutes ago !! i am cryin' rite now .. i called seri but she was stil in sch .. But at least she cheered me up a lil' bit .. i cant stop my tears frm flowing down my cheek .. 3 months++ wif fazly went down the drain .. The LAST SENTENCE i said to him b4 i put down the phone was, "juz continue on wif ur life, bye ....." . I cant take it .. i REGRETTED breaking up wif him, i broke up not bcuz of i hate him, nor itz bcuz of all the fights we had .. itz becuz my decision is wat my mum wants me to do and which she tinks itz the bez for me .. haiz .. I STILL LOVE FAZLY, NOW I HAVE NO MORE BABY BOI !!!!! No !! I cant except tis reality fact !! ..... Tears fall down my cheeks as if it was the niagara falls.. My heart broke as if been hit by a atomic bomb and end up wat Hiroshima is nw .. & I bet fazly is feeling exactly wat i am feeling rite now .. haiz ..

Well, i have decided to break up wif fazly cuz tats wat my mum want me to do .. so i will juz go wif wat my mum wants me to do n tat is wat she said which would be the best for me .. i'm very very very very very very very very very very very very very very SAD & UPSET .. haiz .. but i still have not broke up wif fazly YET .. maybe tonite or tomorrow den i will break up wif him .. i'm very sure he will also be very very very very very very very very very very very very very very UPSET & HEARTBROKEN wif my decision .. well, life still have to go on .. but still in my heart i DO NOT wana leave him .. but the decision has been decided .. tats all for 2dae's blog ..

life has bcome more and more rougher .. My mum said to me that i am not to have anymore contact with fazly ?? i need help !! And sumore, a fren of mine say tat got a sec 1 acad boy lyke me ?? Hu sak is tat guy ?? and then my bez fren is keeping sumting away from me and only tell my other fren .. haiz .. feel so useless rite now .. all i wana do is to die to run away frm all this matter but itz not useful as my death will make more difficulties to everyone . though i want to die so much, i still have to go on wif life .. why is my life lyke tis, my mum dun give me have any contact wif my bf and she wan me to break up wif him, my bez fren probably mayb trust my other fren better den me cuz my bez fren is keeping sumting away frm me and i noe tat cuz we have been frenz 4 a very long time .. i juz wish she could juz share wif me her prob .. haiz .. & levina if you are reading tis, i so totally need your help and i reali2 need to talk to you bout a lot of things as i dont reali tok to u much in sch nowadays .. Help me !! How Come ?!?
